sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; const CheckoutComponent = ({ config, data }) => { const { items = [], subtotal = 0, shipping = 12, total = 0, appliedCoupons = [] } = data; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return `AED ${parseFloat(amount).toFixed(2)}`; }; const renderOrderItem = (item) => (
{item.name}

Size: {item.attributes?.size || 'M'}

Qty: {item.quantity}
{formatCurrency((item.salePrice || item.price) * item.quantity)}
); return (

Checkout

Shipping Information
 First Name Last Name Email Phone Address City Postal Code
Payment Method
Order Summary
{items.map(renderOrderItem)}
Subtotal: {formatCurrency(subtotal)}
Shipping: {formatCurrency(shipping)}
{appliedCoupons.length > 0 && (
Discount: -{formatCurrency(10)}
)}
Total: {formatCurrency(total)}
); }; export default CheckoutComponent;
